description.value:
SpecimenMaterialCodelist
The code _433801000124107_ (Combined nasopharyngeal and oropharyngeal swab) is available in SNOMED, which replaces the _SMC0002_ (Combined nasopharyngeal and oropharyngeal) of the SpecimenMaterial CodeSystem. The SNOMED code should preferably be used.
